perks.name: Bribe
perks.description: If Scorpius wins and you voted for him, Mayor Scorpius will offer you coins as a token of gratitude.

perks.name: Darker Auctions
perks.description: Scorpius will intrude in Dark Auctions, increasing the amount of rounds to 7 and offering special items.

perks.name: Sweet Tooth
perks.description: Grants §a+20% §7chance to get Candy from mobs during the §6Spooky Festival§7.
